relevant_communication:
Organisation of lunch debates and public debates involving EDF experts 
Support of third parties events (e.g. Egmont series of symposimus on the Energy Transition) 
Participation in EC events like Green Week or EU Sustainable Energy Week 
Publication of thematic booklets (e.g. energy efficiency) providing insight into policies and EDF's positions
goals__remit: A key player in energy transition, the EDF Group is an integrated electricity company, active in all areas of the business: generation, transmission, distribution, energy supply and trading, energy services. A global leader in low-carbon energies, the Group has developed a diversified generation mix based on nuclear power, hydropower, new renewable energies and thermal energy. The Group is involved in supplying energy and services to approximately 37.1 million customers, of which 26.2 million in France The Group generated consolidated sales of €71 billion in 2016. EDF is listed on the Paris Stock Exchange.
